DescriptionData.Title: The Usborne Book of Juggling with Balls
DescriptionData.Description: Includes a set of 2.5 inch Vinyl Juggling Balls and the book The Usborne Book of Juggling, which uses step-by-step instructions to teach you how to juggle, gradually leading up to three ball juggling, performing tricks and juggling with friends. It also has ideas for devising costumes, props and routines for a juggling show.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Comes complete with a set of 2.5 inch Vinyl Juggling Balls
Includes juggling instructions, increasing balls, tricks, multiple juggler acts, ideas for costumes and props, and routines
Essential tips for clowns and entertainers of all levels who want to juggle
